entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 6. Forecast issued 6:54 PM CDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
